alert.note: Alert for Los Angeles County Coast including Downtown Los Angeles; San Luis Obispo County Central Coast; Santa Barbara County Central Coast; Ventura County Coast (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 14 at 7:44PM PST until February 15 at 9:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 9 PM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...West to northwest winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 35 mph expected. Strongest winds near the coast. * WHERE...San Luis Obispo County Central Coast, Santa Barbara County Central Coast, Ventura County Coast and Los Angeles County Coast including Downtown Los Angeles. * WHEN...From noon to 9 PM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Los Angeles County Coast including Downtown Los Angeles; San Luis Obispo County Central Coast; Santa Barbara County Central Coast; Ventura County Coast
